title: Investigate Consoul Output When Quiting TUI
description:
Copied from shell session:

```bash
> consoul tui
_GatheringFuture exception was never retrieved
future: <_GatheringFuture finished exception=RuntimeError('cannot reuse already awaited coroutine')>
RuntimeError: cannot reuse already awaited coroutine
_GatheringFuture exception was never retrieved
future: <_GatheringFuture finished exception=RuntimeError('cannot reuse already awaited coroutine')>
RuntimeError: cannot reuse already awaited coroutine
```

notes: During the `consoul tui` session, I chatted with an ollama model and then switched to a claude/anthropic model. The LLMs called multiple tools. I noticed that during a tool call the TUI would freeze. The main issue in this ticket is the output though.
